languages.text:
Призванный наемник получает тот же уровень и то же количество опыта, что и отряд Вольного Торговца на данный момент, при этом наемник не получает никаких предметов и снаряжения.
Вы можете изменять любого наемника через систему перераспределения умений, аналогичную таковой для главного персонажа.
Вы можете иметь неограниченное количество наемников в своем распоряжении. При этом в 1 главе есть ограничение по количеству персонажей в отряде (3 за исключением главного героя). Некоторые события в течение 1 главы увеличивают этот лимит до максимума в 6 персонажей.
Каждый призыв наемника снижает {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}фактор прибыли{/g} на 1.

A recruited mercenary automatically starts at the same level and experience as the Rogue Trader's party, though they do not come with equipment.
You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.
languages.original_text:
Призванный наемник получает тот же уровень и то же количество опыта, что и отряд Вольного Торговца на данный момент, при этом наемник не получает никаких предметов и снаряжения.
Вы можете изменять любого наемника через систему перераспределения умений, аналогичную таковой для главного персонажа.
Вы можете иметь неограниченное количество наемников в своем распоряжении. При этом в 1 главе есть ограничение по количеству персонажей в отряде (3 за исключением главного героя). Некоторые события в течение 1 главы увеличивают этот лимит до максимума в 6 персонажей.
Каждый призыв наемника снижает {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}фактор прибыли{/g} на 1.

traits.locale_text:
A recruited mercenary gains the same level and experience as the Rogue Trader's party, though they do not come with equipment.
You can change any mercenary's abilities using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your profit factor decreases by −1.

You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.

Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.

languages.text:
Ein rekrutierter Söldner beginnt automatisch auf derselben Stufe und mit derselben Erfahrung wie die Gruppe des Freihändlers, verfügt jedoch nicht über Ausrüstung.
Jegliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Söldners lassen sich mittels Ausbildungssystem ähnlich dem für den Hauptcharakter verfügbaren System ändern.
Die Anzahl der möglichen Söldner ist unbegrenzt. In Kapitel 1 ist jedoch die Anzahl der möglichen Charaktere in deiner Gruppe auf 3 begrenzt, dein Hauptcharakter nicht eingeschlossen. Bestimmte Ereignisse in Kapitel 1 können diese Grenze auf maximal 5 erhöhen.
Jedes Mal wenn du einen Söldner rekrutierst, verringert sich dein {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}Profitfaktor{/g} um −1.
languages.original_text:
A recruited mercenary automatically starts at the same level and experience as the Rogue Trader's party, though they do not come with equipment.
You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.

languages.text:
Après avoir été recruté, un mercenaire dispose du même niveau et de la même expérience que le groupe du libre-marchand, mais il n'a pas d'équipement.
Vous pouvez modifier les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du mercenaire en utilisant un système de reconversion similaire à celui de votre personnage principal.
Le nombre de mercenaires dont vous pouvez disposer n'est pas limité. Cependant, au Chapitre 1, votre groupe ne peut compter que 3 personnages, en plus de votre personnage principal. Certains événements du Chapitre 1 peuvent porter cette limite à un maximum de 5.
Chaque fois que vous recrutez un mercenaire, votre {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}facteur d'influence{/g} diminue de −1.
languages.original_text:
A recruited mercenary automatically starts at the same level and experience as the Rogue Trader's party, though they do not come with equipment.
You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.

traits.locale_text:
Après avoir été recruté, un mercenaire dispose du même niveau et de la même expérience que le groupe du libre-marchand, mais il n'a pas d'équipement.
Vous pouvez modifier les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du mercenaire en utilisant un système de reconversion similaire à celui de votre personnage principal.
Le nombre de mercenaires dont vous pouvez disposer n'est pas limité. Cependant, au Chapitre 1, votre groupe ne peut compter que 3 personnages, en plus de votre personnage principal. Certains événements du Chapitre 1 peuvent porter cette limite à un maximum de 5.
Chaque fois que vous recrutez un mercenaire, votre {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}facteur d'influence{/g} diminue de −1.

languages.text:
当雇佣兵被招募时，他们的起始等级与经验会自动与行商浪人的队伍持平，但雇佣兵不会自带任何装备。
您可以使用类似于主角的加点系统，自行选择雇佣兵的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。
雇佣兵的数量没有限制。不过，在第一章中，您的队伍最多只能包含3名成员（不包括主角）。第一章特定事件结束之后，队伍的上限将会扩大至5名成员。
每招募一名雇佣兵，您的{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}利润因子{/g}就会降低1点。
languages.original_text:
A recruited mercenary automatically starts at the same level and experience as the Rogue Trader's party, though they do not come with equipment.
You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.

当雇佣兵被招募时，他们的起始等级与经验会自动与行商浪人的队伍持平，但雇佣兵不会自带任何装备。

每招募一名雇佣兵，您的{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利润因子{/g}就会降低1点。

languages.text:
Los mercenarios reclutados empiezan automáticamente con el mismo nivel y experiencia que el grupo de tu Comerciante Independiente, pero sin equipo ninguno.
Se pueden cambiar las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de cualquier mercenario con un sistema de encauzamiento parecido al que tiene tu personaje principal.
Puedes tener todos los mercenarios que quieras. Sin embargo, en el capítulo 1, únicamente puedes disponer de 3 personajes en el grupo, sin contar a tu personaje principal. Ciertos acontecimientos en el capítulo 1 pueden aumentar dicho límite a un máximo de 5.
Cuando reclutes a un mercenario, tu {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}factor de beneficio{/g} se ve reducido en −1.
languages.original_text:
A recruited mercenary automatically starts at the same level and experience as the Rogue Trader's party, though they do not come with equipment.
You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.

traits.locale_text:
Los mercenarios reclutados empiezan automáticamente con el mismo nivel y experiencia que el grupo de tu Comerciante Independiente, pero sin equipo ninguno.
Se pueden cambiar las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de cualquier mercenario con un sistema de encauzamiento parecido al que tiene tu personaje principal.
Puedes tener todos los mercenarios que quieras. Sin embargo, en el capítulo 1, únicamente puedes disponer de 3 personajes en el grupo, sin contar a tu personaje principal. Ciertos acontecimientos en el capítulo 1 pueden aumentar dicho límite a un máximo de 5.
Cuando reclutes a un mercenario, tu {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}factor de beneficio{/g} se ve reducido en −1.

languages.original_text:
A summoned mercenary gains the same level and the same amount of experience as the Free Merchant's squad at the moment, and the mercenary does not receive any items or equipment.
The player can modify any mercenary through a skill redistribution system similar to that of the main character.
The player can have an unlimited number of mercenaries at his disposal. At the same time, the player in Chapter 1 has a limit on the number of characters in the party (3 except for the main character). Some events during Chapter 1 increase this limit to a maximum of 6 characters.
Each mercenary call reduces the player's profit factor by 1.

languages.text:
部隊に加入した傭兵は自動的にローグトレーダーのパーティーと同じレベルと経験値でスタートするが、装備は所持していない。
傭兵の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はメインキャラクターと同様の再訓練システムを使用して変更することができる。
使用できる傭兵の数に制限はない。しかし第一章では、パーティーに参加させられるキャラクターの数はメインキャラクターを除いて3人までという制限がある。第一章の特定のイベントでは、この制限を最大5人にまで増やすことができる。
傭兵を加入させる度、{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}利益因子{/g}が1減少する。
languages.original_text:
A recruited mercenary automatically starts at the same level and experience as the Rogue Trader's party, though they do not come with equipment.
You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.

部隊に加入した傭兵は自動的にローグトレーダーのパーティーと同じレベルと経験値でスタートするが、装備は所持していない。
傭兵の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はメインキャラクターと同様の再訓練システムを使用して変更することができる。
使用できる傭兵の数に制限はない。しかし第一章では、パーティーに参加させられるキャラクターの数はメインキャラクターを除いて3人までという制限がある。第一章の特定のイベントでは、この制限を最大5人にまで増やすことができる。
傭兵を加入させる度、{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利益因子{/g}が1減少する。

languages.text:
Aranıza katılan bir paralı asker, Hür Tacir'in grubuyla aynı seviye ve tecrübe puanıyla başlar ancak herhangi bir ekipmanla birlikte gelmez.
Paralı askerin {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerinden{/g} istediğini, ana karakterinkine benzer bir yeniden eğitim sisteminden faydalanarak değiştirebilirsin.
Sahip olabileceğin paralı asker sayısında sınırlama yoktur. Ancak 1. Bölüm'de grubunda bulundurabileceğin karakter sayısı, ana karakterin hariç 3 ile sınırlandırılmıştır. 1. Bölüm'deki belirli birtakım olaylar bu sınırı 5'e kadar çıkarabilir.
Maiyetine her paralı asker kattığında {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}kâr faktörün{/g} 1 puan düşer.
languages.original_text:

You can change any of the mercenary's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} using the retraining system similar to the one available to your main character.
There is no limit on the number of mercenaries you can have. However, in Chapter 1, the number of characters you can have in your party is limited to 3, not including your main character. Certain events in Chapter 1 can increase this limit to a maximum of 5.
Each time you recruit a mercenary, your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} decreases by −1.
